pages.text: You've discovered a new type of fungus that can only grow on Crimson or Warped Stems/Hyphae called Snap Fungus. The Fungus is a ball full of toxins that one can't help but throw upwards in the air. When hitting something, they will explode, with a chance of leaving behind a small cloud of poison. Curiously, the explosion does not effect the thrower nor their servants.

It appears that you can only throw a large amount of them at a time. On one hand, you get to throw multiple at once, on the other, you can't throw any more for a couple of seconds. You've also discovered a way to increase the potency of the fungi by combining 4 of them with a Ghast Tear. These Blast Fungi's explosions have larger radius but they no longer leave any poison clouds.
